title: Building Scalable React Applications with Next.js 14
excerpt: Learn how to build high-performance, scalable React applications using the latest features of Next.js 14, including Server Components and App Router.

children.text: Next.js 14 brings exciting new features that make building scalable React applications easier than ever. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the latest additions and best practices.

title: Integrating OpenAI GPT-4 into Your Web Applications
excerpt: A practical guide to integrating OpenAI's GPT-4 API into your web applications, including best practices for prompt engineering and cost optimization.

children.text: AI integration is transforming modern web applications. This tutorial shows you how to effectively integrate GPT-4 into your projects while managing costs and optimizing performance.

title: TypeScript Best Practices for Large-Scale Applications
excerpt: Essential TypeScript patterns and practices for building maintainable, type-safe applications at scale.

children.text: TypeScript has become the de facto standard for large-scale JavaScript applications. Let's explore the patterns and practices that will make your TypeScript codebase robust and maintainable.

title: Building Real-Time Features with WebSockets
excerpt: Learn how to implement real-time features in your web applications using WebSockets, including chat systems and live updates.

children.text: Real-time features are no longer a luxuryâ€”they're expected. This guide walks you through implementing WebSockets for chat, notifications, and live data updates.

title: Optimizing Database Performance in Node.js Applications
excerpt: Deep dive into database optimization techniques for Node.js applications, covering query optimization, indexing, and caching strategies.

children.text: Database performance can make or break your application. Learn proven strategies for optimizing your database queries and improving overall application performance.

title: My Journey from Junior to Senior Developer
excerpt: Lessons learned and insights gained during my 7-year journey from junior developer to senior full-stack engineer.

children.text: Becoming a senior developer is about more than just technical skills. Here's what I learned during my journey and advice for aspiring developers.
